meanings.sent1: The clown's silly antics were undignified.
meanings.sent2: Her messy eating habits were quite undignified.
meanings.sent3: The dog's undignified attempt to catch its tail made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The undignified scramble for the last piece of cake was comical.
meanings.sent5: The undignified dance moves at the party were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Not in keeping with the standards of proper behavior or good taste
meanings.sent1: His rude comments were undignified and hurtful.
meanings.sent2: The loud argument in the restaurant was undignified.
meanings.sent3: The undignified burping contest at the dinner table shocked everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her undignified behavior at the formal event was embarrassing.
meanings.sent5: The undignified outfit she wore to the wedding raised eyebrows.
